Team4450.Lib

Class MonitorCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Team4450.Lib.MonitorCompressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MonitorCompressor
extends java.lang.Thread
    Compressor monitoring task. Runs as a separate thread from our MyRobot class. Runs until our program is terminated from the RoboRio. Displays compressor on/off LED on DS. Can also monitor an air pressure sensor and report the pressure to the DS. Assumes compressor is plugged into the first PCM, device id 0.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MonitorCompressor getInstance()
        Get a reference to global MonitorCompressor Thread object. Only monitors compressor on/off and sets DS LED named Compressor accordingly.
        Returns:
        Reference to global MonitorCompressor object.

      • getInstance

        public static MonitorCompressor getInstance(int pressureSensorPort)
        Get a reference to global MonitorCompressor Thread object. Monitors compressor on/off and sets DS LED named Compressor accordingly. Also monitors pressure on analog I/O port. Pressure is displayed on DS gauge called AirPressure. Can also do an alarm LED called LowPressure if you set the low pressure threshold.
        Parameters:
        pressureSensorPort - Analog input port number pressure sensor is plugged into.
        Returns:
        Reference to global MonitorCompressor object.

      • getInstance

        public static MonitorCompressor getInstance(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogInput pressureSensor)
        Get a reference to global MonitorCompressor Thread object. Monitors compressor on/off and sets DS LED named Compressor accordingly. Also monitors pressure on analog I/O port. Pressure is displayed on DS gauge called AirPressure. Can also do an alarm LED called LowPressure if you set the low pressure threshold.
        Parameters:
        pressureSensor - AnalogInput instance for port pressure sensor is plugged into.
        Returns:
        Reference to global MonitorCompressor object.

      • getPressure

        public int getPressure()
        If monitoring pressure, return the current pressure.
        Returns:
        Current pressure in PSI.

      • getVoltage

        public double getVoltage()
        Return the pressure sensor current voltage.
        Returns:
        Sensor voltage.

      • convertV2PSI

        public double convertV2PSI(double voltage)
        Convert the pressure sensor voltage to PSI.
        Parameters:
        voltage - Input voltage from sensor.
        Returns:
        Pressure in PSI.

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(double seconds)
        Set the delay of the sampling loop. Longer delay works when only monitoring compressor on/off. Shorter delay may be appropriate when monitoring pressure.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Delay in second between samples. Minimum .5 second. Defaults to 2 seconds.

      • setCorrection

        public void setCorrection(double psi)
        Set correction value to be added to the pressure to make it match the gauge.
        Parameters:
        psi - Correction value in PSI.

      • SetLowPressureAlarm

        public void SetLowPressureAlarm(double psi)
        Enable low pressure alarm LED on DS by setting pressure at which alarm will trigger. Expects LED to be named LowPressure.
        Parameters:
        psi - The low pressure in PSI.

      • run

        public void run()
        Start monitoring. Called by Thread.start().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
